sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"宣布，公开"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: announce, declare, proclaim, pronounce, advertise, broadcast, publish
means: announce ：多指首次宣布大家感兴趣或可满足大家好奇心的事情。
declare ：侧重正式就某事清楚明白地宣布。
proclaim ：指官方宣布重大事件或施政方针，语体比announce正式。
pronounce ：词义与announce, declare接近，但较多用于指法律判决方面的宣布。
advertise ：指通过文字和图像资料等的反复宣传而引起公众的注意，有时隐含令人不快或言过其实的意味。
broadcast ：专指利用广播或电视传播消息或发表见解。
publish ：专指通过报刊或其它媒介向公众公布事情。

sentence.Network_en: She was planning to announce her engagement to Peter.
sentence.Network_cn: 她正计划宣布她和彼得订婚一事。

sentence.Network_en: She was bursting to announce the news but was sworn to secrecy.
sentence.Network_cn: 她急不可待想宣布这个消息，但却发过誓要守口如瓶。

sentence.Network_en: The RSC was calling a press conference to announce the theatre's closure.
sentence.Network_cn: 皇家莎士比亚剧团要召开新闻发布会，宣布剧院关闭。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from French annoncer, from Latin annuntiare, from ad- 'to' + nuntiare 'declare, announce' (from nuntius 'messenger')

entry.def: If you announce something, you tell people about it publicly or officially.

example.ex: He will announce tonight that he is resigning from office...
She was planning to announce her engagement to Peter...
example.tran: 她正计划宣布她和彼得订婚一事。

entry.tran: 大声宣告，郑重地说（尤指令人不快之事）
entry.def: If you announce a piece of news or an intention, especially something that people may not like, you say it loudly and clearly, so that everyone you are with can hear it.

example.ex: Peter announced that he had no intention of wasting his time at any university...
example.tran: 彼得宣称他无意在任何一所大学浪费时间。

example.ex: 'I'm having a bath and going to bed,' she announced, and left the room.
example.tran: “我要洗个澡然后上床睡觉，”她大声说完便离开了房间。

entry.tran: （机场或火车站工作人员通过扬声器）播报，通知
entry.def: If an airport or railway employee announces something, they tell the public about it by means of a loudspeaker system.

example.ex: Station staff announced the arrival of the train over the tannoy...
example.tran: 车站工作人员通过广播告知火车到站了。

example.ex: They announced his plane was delayed.
example.tran: 广播通知他所乘的航班晚点了。

entry.tran: （以信件、声音、信号等）通知，告知
entry.def: If a letter, sound, or sign announces something, it informs people about it.

example.ex: The next letter announced the birth of another boy...
example.tran: 下一封信通知又一个男孩出生了。

example.ex: His entrance was announced by a buzzer connected to the door.
example.tran: 他刚一进去，与门相连的门铃便嗡嗡作响。

entry.tran: （仆人）通报，宣布（膳食备齐或来宾到达）
entry.def: If a meal or a guest is announced by a servant at a formal party, the servant says clearly that the meal is ready or the guest has arrived.

example.tran: 已宣布开饭了，菜都上齐了。

sentences.sentence: "He announced the winners of the spelling bee"

auth_sentence.content: Some do it privately, others announce it publicly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some do it privately, others announce it publicly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some do it privately, others announce it publicly.

auth_sentence.content: The electoral commission has three days to announce results.
auth_sentence.res_content: The electoral commission has three days to announce results.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The electoral commission has three days to announce results.

auth_sentence.content: Summers decided to announce his resignation before the meeting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Summers decided to announce his resignation before the meeting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Summers decided to announce his resignation before the meeting.

stems_affixes.word_buile: announce[v.通告]+ment表名词→n.布告,通告;声明,预告
an一再+nounce通知→一再通知→通告

stems_affixes.value_cn: 公开指责,公然抨击;谴责
stems_affixes.word_buile: de坏+nounce讲话,说出→讲坏话→抨击

stems_affixes.value_cn: 公开指责,公然抨击,谴责
stems_affixes.word_buile: denounce[v.公开指责,公然抨击;谴责]+ate表动词→v.公开指责,公然抨击,谴责
pro在前+nounce讲话,说出→在[嘴]前讲话→发音
re反+nounce讲话,说出→反过来说→否认

Sentence.sentence: As part of the Kids Live Well campaign-expected to be announced nationwide Wednesday—participating restaurants must promise to offer at least one children's meal that has fewer than 600 calories(卡路里), no soft drinks and at least two items from the following food groups: fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins or low-fat dairy.
We can't announce other people's news," said Greg Joswiak, vice president of iPod and iPhone marketing at Apple.
When the Ford Motor Company, for example, recently announced that it was bringing some production home, the White House cheered.

At least four institutions - the University of Maryland, Oklahoma Christian University, Abilene Christian and Freed-Hardeman- have announced that they will give the devices to some or all of their students this fall

means.word_mean: 宣布, 宣告, 发表,公告

sentences.en: They announced that a cold wave would come soon.
sentences.cn: 他们报告说不久寒流就要来。

sentences.en: Have they announced when the race will begin?
sentences.cn: 他们宣布比赛什么时候开始了吗?

sentences.en: A voice on the phone announced itself as Mr. Baker.
sentences.cn: 电话里的人说他是贝克先生。

sentences.en: “I've a proposal to make, ” she announced as she entered.
sentences.cn: 她一进来就对大家说“我有个建议。”

sentences.en: Would you announce the guests as they come in?
sentences.cn: 客人来时你通报一声好吗?

sentences.en: The bright flowers and warm winds announced that spring was here.
sentences.cn: 鲜艳的花朵和暖和的风已表明春天到了。

sentences.en: The inauguration of the President is announced for Friday.
sentences.cn: 总统的就职典礼已定于星期五举行。

jushi.english: He announces for a national network.
jushi.chinese: 他是一个全球性广播网的广播员。

jushi.english: He announces the biggest football game.
jushi.chinese: 他担任一场最大足球比赛的讲解员。

jushi.english: The book was announced in print.
jushi.chinese: 根据预告该书正在印刷中。
